about.description1: Established in 2009, Genuine Partner Group has become one of Vietnam's leading corporations in logistics, commerce and services.
about.description2: With the business philosophy "Inheritance - Self-Business - Greening - Happiness", we continuously develop and expand our ecosystem to best serve our customers.

hero.description1: Shaping the future with clear vision and sustainable mission
hero.description2: We are committed to bringing value • innovation • sustainable development to businesses and communities
hero.quote1: The path to success is nothing more than wisdom and patience
hero.quote2: The foundation of success is nothing more than truth and love

vision.description1: By applying advanced and intelligent technologies, we create and connect values that help goods flow smoothly and reliably in the market to develop human life, businesses and the economy sustainably.
vision.description2: From there, we contribute to building a better society by providing quality products and services that align with global development trends to improve the quality of life for employees, partners, customers and the public.

mission.description1: Continuously innovating and improving technology to bring quality products and services to businesses and customers.
mission.description2: Continuously creating and providing added value for all stakeholders, actively contributing to the sustainable development of society and ensuring minimal environmental impact.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Building strong trust with customers, partners and the community through transparency and honesty in all business activities.

responsibility.title: Spirit of Responsibility
responsibility.description: Demonstrating high responsibility in all work, committed to bringing the best value to customers and society.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Development
sustainability.description: Towards sustainable development, balancing economic, social and environmental benefits for present and future generations.

metadata.keywords: Goodness Group, community, social welfare, Genuine Partner Group, SWC, social work, non-profit, An Yen bridges, charity

hero.title: Goodness Group
hero.subtitle: Community & Social Welfare
hero.description: Promoting community activities and social welfare of the GPG Ecosystem to create conditions for sustainable development

overview.title: Role of Goodness Group
overview.description: The Goodness Group focuses on promoting community activities and social welfare. We are committed to building social business models that help communities develop better and honor the spirit of compassion.

compassion.title: Spirit of Compassion
compassion.description: Serving the community is not only a social responsibility but also a part of creating value

sustainability.title: Sustainable Development
sustainability.description: Building social business models that help communities develop better

activities.title: Main Activities
activities.description: The Goodness Group implements regular and sustainable social projects and programs

social_work.title: Community Social Work
social_work.description: With the establishment of Community Social Work Company Limited (SWC), SWC is a social enterprise operating business oriented towards education, healthcare and social work activities.
social_work.details: GPG is oriented to build regular and sustainable social projects and programs, creating social business models that help communities develop better.

non_profit.title: Non-profit Organizations
non_profit.description: GPG cooperates with Vietnam Youth Social Work Center (YSW), accompanying partners, Vietnam Youth Union in provinces and cities to implement and carry out the 'Building 100 An Yen Bridges' project.
non_profit.details: This is one of the key projects with the goal of gradually eliminating and replacing temporary bridges, building new rural areas; helping students get to school safely; making it easier for people to travel.

social_welfare.title: Social Welfare
social_welfare.description: Promoting community activities and social welfare of the GPG Ecosystem creates conditions for sustainable development.
social_welfare.details: We believe that serving the community is not only a social responsibility but also a part of creating value and honoring the spirit of compassion.

spring_volunteer.description: Coordinated organization of 'People's Movement - Border Spring' program in An Giang - Organize free medical examinations and gift giving for 300 people in difficult circumstances

free_consultation.title: Free consultation and medical examination
free_consultation.description: Organize consultation, medical examination, free medicine distribution and gift giving for 400 people in difficult circumstances in Son Ha commune, Son Hoa district and An Hiep commune, Tuy An district

yagi_storm.title: Yagi Storm Support
yagi_storm.description: Donated 2.5 tons of rice to people in Trang Dinh district, Lang Son province affected by storm No. 3 - Yagi storm

school_facilities.title: School facility renovation
school_facilities.description: Support renovation of 01 toilet at An Tuc Secondary School, An Tuc commune, Tri Ton district, An Giang province

help_students.title: 'Helping Students to School' Program
help_students.description: Support 631 warm coats and 02 computer sets for students at Tan Lap Primary & Secondary School, Tan Lap commune, Luc Yen district, Yen Bai province

love_connection.title: 'Love Connection' Program
love_connection.description: Support toilet and library upgrade projects for Tan Lap Primary School, Tan Lap commune, Luc Ngan district, Bac Giang province and schools in Yen Son district, Tuyen Quang province

spring_unity.title: 'Spring Unity' Program
spring_unity.description: Donated 200 warm blankets at 'Spring Unity, Tet with military-civilian love' program in Son La province

teacher_student_support.title: Teacher and student support
teacher_student_support.description: Gift 100 sets of ao dai fabric for teachers; Gift 50 scholarships for students who overcome difficulties and study well

family_support.title: Support for difficult families
family_support.description: Gift more than 550 gifts to difficult families in Phu Thanh ward, Tuy Hoa city; An Dinh commune and Chi Thanh town, Tuy An district; Tran Phu High School

disabled_support.title: Support for people with disabilities
disabled_support.description: Visit, give gifts and 20 wheelchairs to people with disabilities (Tuy An District People with Disabilities Support Association)

border_spring.title: Border Spring Program
border_spring.description: Donated 01 computer set, 01 Tet gift for Binh Thanh Border Post and 01 Tet gift for Union member family in Tan Hoa Thuan hamlet, Tan Hoi commune, Hong Ngu city, Dong Thap province

joyful_tet.title: 'Joyful Tet' Program
joyful_tet.description: Donated 125 gifts to near-poor households in difficult circumstances in Tan Thang and Thang Hai communes, Ham Tan district

love_tet.title: 'Love Tet' Program
love_tet.description: Organize 'Love Tet' program 2024 in Thai Nguyen province - Donated 60 gifts to children at Thai Ha Center

hero.title: Great Journey
hero.description2: GPG has become a leading logistics company in Vietnam

summary.title: Genuine Partner Group
summary.subtitle: Today
summary.description2: Developed into a diverse ecosystem with 22 member companies and 15 container depots

2009.title: GPG Establishment
2009.description: Genuine Partner Group (GPG) was established on May 11, 2009, marking an important milestone in Vietnam's logistics sector.

2010.title: First Depot Establishment
2010.description: Established Depot: Chân Thật Sóng Thần exploitation center, Chân Thật Phú Thuận CY - foundation for the container depot system.

2011-2012.title: Member Company System Expansion
2011-2012.description: Established member companies: Container Solutions VN LLC, Tan Cang Phuong Dong Logistics JSC, and 3rd Depot - Tan Cang Phuong Dong.

2013-2014.title: Strategic Partnerships and Service Expansion
2013-2014.description: Became Coca Cola distribution service provider. Established 4th Depot & inaugurated mobile container maintenance and repair center.

2015-2016.title: International Expansion
2015-2016.description: Opened many more branches, shipping line agency offices, representative offices, depots, warehouses in Vietnam & Cambodia.

2017.title: Restructuring and Technology Innovation
2017.description: Established Tay Nam Binh Duong Container Yard. Successfully completed 2nd system restructuring. 2017 production soared. Successfully deployed & applied HRMS software. Exploited railway transport routes.

2018.title: Year of Awards
2018.description: Honored to receive 'Outstanding Ho Chi Minh City Enterprise 2018' award. Inaugurated PTSC – Chân Thật Depot. Honored to receive 'Top 200 Golden Vietnam Awards 2018' title.

2019.title: Government Recognition
2019.description: Honored to receive Prime Minister's Certificate of Merit. Honored to receive Ho Chi Minh City People's Committee's Traditional Flag. Honored to receive Central Committee of Vietnam Youth Union's Certificate of Merit.

2022.title: Ecosystem Expansion and Social Responsibility
2022.description: Successfully built 15 domestic and international Depots. Expanded 22 member companies under the Corporation system. Partnered with Youth Social Work Center & Love Journey Club in the project to build 100 An Yen bridges in localities.

T1/2023.title: Digital Transformation and International Expansion
T1/2023.description: Merged with Logistics Technology Application Company (LTA), pioneering digital transformation in container exploitation operations through i-Depot superAPP@LTA. Strategic direction to expand Container Depot services to Sihanoukville (Cambodia), Laem Chabang & Bangkok (Thailand).

T7/2023.title: Ecosystem Activation
T7/2023.description: Officially activated the Genuine Partner Group Ecosystem centered around building a solid, stable and sustainable business environment to create value for Customers & related Partners.

2024.title: Sustainable Development
2024.description: Continue to develop the Genuine Partner Group ecosystem sustainably, based on advanced logistics systems and positive adaptation to meet sustainability, digitalization, multimodal transport needs, compliance, future workforce and emission reduction goals.
